text: Guys may refer to: * Guys, Tennessee, a little town * Constantin Guys (1802-1892), Dutch-born war correspondent, painter and illustrator * The Guys, a 2002 play by Anne Nelson * Guys (comics), the seventh novel in Canadian cartoonist Dave Sim's Cerebus comic book series * GUYS, an attack team featured in the Japanese television series Ultraman Mebius * KGuys, YouTube channel ==See also== * Guy (disambiguation)
title: Guys
